column5: Just wondering if anyone has been fishing on Agnew Lake or the Espanola area lately?? I am leaving on Sunday and was wondering how the fishing has been. Thanks in advance.

Not much action on Agnew I understand but you might want to try the Spanish River at Espanola or go to Vance's Marina at Massey. I heard tonight they are catching them in larger numbers. Two of my friends are headed there in 6 hours. I would go to Massey I think.
